```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(readr)
```

## Setup and data QC

```{r data-ingest}
# Read in data from premis-ghg (SP and BBL's greenhouse gas repository)
licor_daily_data <- read_csv("data/premis-ghg/licor_daily_data.csv",
                             col_types = "Tdccddddd")
plot_data <- read_csv("data/premis-ghg/plot_data.csv",
                      col_types = "ccccddd")
```

```{r data-qc}
p <- ggplot(licor_daily_data) +
  aes(x = Timestamp, y = meanFlux, color = Destination_Plot) +
  geom_point(na.rm = TRUE)
print(p)
```
